hero.title: GenAI Engineer
hero.subtitle: & Software Developer
hero.description: Building intelligent systems with LLMs, RAG, and cutting-edge AI technologies

about.label: About Me
about.title: Turning ideas into
about.paragraph1: I'm a Gen AI engineer on a mission to turn ideas into intelligent, creative systems. After five years exploring almost every corner of IT; from code and data to workflows and pipelines; I finally found my sweet spot: generative AI.
about.paragraph2: This year, I've been all in, building, fine-tuning, and evaluating LLMs, designing systems that can think, create, and collaborate. I may not have papers to prove it, but I have years of real, hands-on experience, contributing to personal projects, local initiatives, and building things that actually work. I care deeply about understanding the full picture; how models behave, how they can fail, and how to make them reliable in the real world.
about.paragraph3: I'm fascinated by the playground of LLMs, agents, and pipelines, and I'm always chasing ways to push AI further; safer, smarter, and more useful. If it involves Gen AI, experimentation, or imagining what's next, that's where you'll find me.

experience.label: Arkadia Heilbronn
experience.title: Apprenticeship Programs
experience.description: 6-month intensive apprenticeship spanning AI, MLOps, and Cloud Engineering

programs.title: AI Evaluation Engineer
programs.description: Designed and implemented a complete automated evaluation suite for large language models. Curated domain-specific datasets, defined custom evaluation metrics, and built tests for bias, robustness, and real-world applicability. Developed a security benchmark for LLMs using open datasets from documented prompt injection and jailbreak attacks.

programs.title: Cloud Engineer
programs.description: Built IaaS foundation using OpenStack and developed PaaS layer with Kubernetes. Designed managed service product with auto-scaling, multi-region deployment, and infrastructure-as-code using Terraform. Built Vue.js-based web UI secured via JWT, and implemented observability with Prometheus and Grafana.

programs.title: Generative AI Engineer
programs.description: Designed AI agent workflow using LangGraph and implemented RAG with vector stores for context-aware solutions. Enabled collaboration between agents and integrated components into a cohesive system demonstrating how LLM agents can work together dynamically.

programs.title: Machine Learning Engineer
programs.description: Explored data relationships, trained ML models, deployed to MLflow, and automated workflows using Dagster for production-ready MLOps. Built a pipeline that triggers automatically upon arrival of new data; enabling a fully automated system.

projects.label: Featured Projects
projects.title: Github
projects.description: Building innovative solutions across AI, MLOps, full-stack development, and cloud infrastructure

items.title: 42sports
items.description: A full-stack web application built for managing sports tournaments and player statistics. It allows users to create, join, and follow sports events with real-time updates and interactive leaderboards.

items.title: MLOps Pipeline
items.description: An end-to-end Machine Learning operations pipeline designed for production-grade model deployment. Integrates modular ML components to automate data preprocessing, training, evaluation, and monitoring workflows.

items.title: Web Game
items.description: A multiplayer online game platform combining real-time gaming with social networking features. Backend services manage matchmaking and game state synchronization in real time.

items.title: Security Benchmark
items.description: An AI safety evaluation framework aimed at assessing large language model robustness and compliance. Provides structured testing for evaluating model responses against rule-based criteria.

items.title: Go Web Service
items.description: A Go web service that receives notifications via HTTP POST, validates them, and forwards 'Warning' type notifications to Google Chat. Features REST API validation, in-memory storage, filtering logic, and health check endpoints.

items.title: AI Multi-Agent Workflow System
items.description: A comprehensive AI automation system using multiple coordinated agents to handle customer tickets and workflow routing. Leverages agent orchestration frameworks for autonomous collaboration.

education.label: Education
education.title: Academic Background
education.description: Strong foundation in IT, mathematics, and computer science

items.description: Completed an intensive, project-based software engineering program focused on algorithms, system programming, and collaborative problem-solving in real-world environments.

items.degree: Bachelor of Technology - Mathematics & Computer Science
items.description: Studied advanced mathematics, programming, and computer science fundamentals with a focus on applied problem-solving and computational theory.
Completed rigorous preparatory courses emphasizing physics, mathematics, and engineering principles for entrance into competitive technical schools.
